name: CreateMailchimpAutomation
description:
Create a new classic automation in Mailchimp.

This tool initiates the creation of a new classic automation within your Mailchimp account, facilitating automated email campaigns.

parameters.name: automation_workflow_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of Automation workflow. Currently, only 'abandonedCart' is supported.

value_schema.description: The type of Automation workflow. Currently only supports 'abandonedCart'.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp List to target with the automation.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store in Mailchimp. Required to target specific automation to a store.

parameters.name: automation_from_name
parameters.description: The 'from' name to display in the new automation emails. It should be an easily recognizable name for recipients.

value_schema.description: The 'from' name for the Automation (not an email address).

parameters.name: reply_to_email_address
parameters.description: The reply-to email address for the automation in Mailchimp.

value_schema.description: The reply-to email address for the Automation.
